title.narrative: Strengthen Border Management and Security in Mali and Niger through Capacity Building of Border Authorities and Enhanced Dialogue with Border Communities

description.narrative: This project aims to enhance institutional and operational capacities to secure and manage borders between Mali and Niger by developing stronger community engagement and more coherent approaches to border management in the Gao (Mali), Tillaberi (Niger) regions through establishing cooperation/collaboration mechanisms. It will first improve authorities’ understanding of challenges and needs faced by populations living along the borders and foster mutual trust between both groups as well as maintain the social and cultural fabric to prevent the area from becoming a no man’s land. This will be complemented by the extension of community prevention and communication networks operating in coordination with local authorities in charge of border management. Secondly, the proposed action will seek to improve cross-border communication between authorities and law enforcement forces and communities from Niger and Mali, focusing on trust building and the prevention of radicalization and criminality, efficient coordination, anti-corruption measures and empowerment of youth and women’s civil society organizations. Lastly, this project will improve border management in Niger through capacity building of security forces, provision of communication equipment and improvement of border infrastructures.
